attributes.action: Take action against the current critical situation in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation for the people of Zimbabwe has been dire for some years now but it has finally reached a truly critical state. Surely as British citizens we must recognise the fact that Zimbabwe was once Southern Rhodesia and that as colonists of this country we must still remain partially responsible  for the reacting to current crisis. WHERE IS THE BRITISH INTERVENTION?  Zimbabwe is under viscious Dictatorship and Millions are starving. We, the undersigned ask the British Government to take action against the current Situation in Zimbabwe..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
